original_title: La sfinge sorride prima di morire - stop - Londra
overview: Shot on location in Egypt, the story unfurls like an Italian Giallo as a group of people meet under strange circumstances, and one by one they are murdered. Gold is missing so you suspect a thief is trying to cover up his crime but that might be too obvious.

production_companies.name: Egyptian General Company for International Film Production

title: Secret of the Sphinx
